create.title: Create Server
create.no_java: No Java detected, please click the button below to scan
create.java_scan: Scan all disks for Java installations

config.title: Config Edit
config.no_server: Please select a server to edit config
config.no_config: No config file found. Please start the server once to generate server.properties

players.title: Player Manage
players.server_not_running: Player management requires server to be running
players.server_not_running_hint: ⚠ Server not running, cannot send commands

settings.title: Settings
settings.auto_stop_desc: Automatically send stop command to running servers when exiting Sea Lantern to prevent data loss
settings.auto_eula_desc: Automatically write eula=true before starting server, eliminating manual modification
settings.server_defaults_desc: Default parameters used when creating new servers
settings.max_memory_desc: Recommended at least 1024MB. Large modded servers may need 4096MB or more
settings.min_memory_desc: Recommended to set to 1/4 to 1/2 of max memory
settings.default_java_desc: Leave blank to automatically detect the most suitable Java each time
settings.jvm_args_desc: These parameters will be added to all server startups. Suitable for GC optimization parameters
settings.port_desc: Minecraft default port is 25565. Multiple servers need different ports
settings.console_font_size_desc: Size of console log text, default 13
settings.max_log_lines_desc: Maximum number of log lines to keep per server, older logs are automatically cleared beyond this limit. Default 5000
settings.appearance_desc: Customize software background and visual effects
settings.theme_desc: Select the theme appearance of the application, "Follow System" will automatically match the system's dark/light mode
settings.font_size_desc: Adjust the size of interface text
settings.font_family_desc: Select the font used by the interface, some fonts need to be installed on the system or loaded from the network
settings.acrylic_desc: Enable Windows system-level acrylic glass effect, compatible with background images
settings.acrylic_not_supported: Acrylic effect not supported on current system
settings.background_desc: Upload an image as software background, supports PNG, JPG, WEBP and other formats
settings.opacity_desc: Adjust the opacity of the background image (0.0 - 1.0), smaller values are more transparent
settings.blur_desc: Add blur effect to the background to make foreground content clearer
settings.brightness_desc: Adjust the brightness of the background image (0.0 - 2.0), 1.0 is original brightness
settings.background_size_desc: Select how the background image is displayed
settings.reset_desc: Are you sure you want to restore all settings to default values? This operation cannot be undone.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Minecraft Server Management Tool
about.hero_desc:
A Minecraft server launcher built by the community.
Not just open source code, but a soul defined by you.
about.manifesto_text1: Sea Lantern is a glowing block in Minecraft — made from countless fragments, yet emitting soft and persistent light.
about.manifesto_text2:
Just like this project, every contributor is a piece of sea lantern.
When we come together, we illuminate the entire community.
about.contributor_desc: Everyone who makes this project better
about.way_code_desc: Submit PRs, fix bugs or add features
about.way_promote_desc: Share with more MC server owners
about.footer_text1: Sea Lantern is an open-source project under GPLv3 license.
about.footer_text2: Minecraft is a registered trademark of Mojang Studios. This project is not affiliated with Mojang.
about.footer_quote: "We built the skeleton, and the soul is up to you."
